    • mayAllowInsertion

      default boolean mayAllowInsertion()
      Description copied from interface: ItemTransfer
      Heuristically determine if this transfer object allows inserting items, i.e. if it's a slot based inventory and has no slots, it probably doesn't allow insertion.
      Specified by:
      mayAllowInsertion in interface ItemTransfer

    • sendChangeNotification

      @Internal default void sendChangeNotification(int slot)
      Forces a change notification to any listeners for the given slot. For internal use only. This should also cause the inventory to be saved.
